title: AOL
author: AOL
created_time: August 04, 2023, 09:13:27 PMLast edit: October 13, 2024, 11:44:45 PM by AOL
content: PLEASE READ INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY BEFORE APPLICATION. WRONG FORMAT WILL LEAD TO DISQUALIFICATION AND DELETION OF APPLICATION.SEC Token on PulseChainAbout: On July 31, 2023 SEC sued Richard Heart for the creation of HEX & PulseChain. SEC token was born on the very same day on PulseChain. Total supply of 420,000,000 token was initially available at PulseX.com against 1,000,000 PLS. One can verify everything on chain @ https://dexscreener.com/pulsechain/0x6da4f7c69fb5c30188a5215a8db1e1f0fbdf84c7. == Twitter Campaign == Campaign Start Date: August 05, 2023Campaign End Date: December 31, 2024If you do not have a PulseChain address, you may easily get one with MetaMask. Please check https://PulseChain.com to get network parameters. Add SEC token to MetaMask by importing the following token address from PulseChain network: 0xab4242c0420d175e39bD0CC049263B920E4bCE17.Task1. Follow https://x.com/CoinMasterRace2. ReTweet https://x.com/CoinMasterRace/status/18288901739390853573. Tweet the Following in reply to https://x.com/CoinMasterRace/status/1828890173939085357...Code:As per the chart, $SEC is outperforming @HEXcrypto($HEX) & @PulsechainCom($PLS) in terms of gain!@abit_HEX @HexStinna @hodldogofficial @HviidHEX @MatiAllin @K4KCrypto @KatieePCryptoWill it really do 10000x?<My_PulseChain_Address>Please replace <My_PulseChain_Address> in the above tweet with your own PulseChain address. 4. Post the tweet link here in this thread along with your following & follower count in following format...Code:X.com Link: X.com Followers: X.com Following: You'll receive SEC tokens as per your follower count at the tweeted PulseChain address, i.e. <My_PulseChain_Address>. Payment will be made within one week of your post.
